pageContext.claim: “I didn't think it was exactly the right time to pray. I'm on the sidewalk. And the church itself, I didn't want to go in because they had a lot of insurance reasons. You know, the church was boarded up.”
pageContext.analysis: Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde of the Episcopal Diocese of Washington [told CNN that there were "no insurance reasons" that prevented Trump from entering St. John's Episcopal Church. Budde said there was no conversation between Trump's team and church leaders before Trump showed up at the church, which is located a short walk from the White House. Presidents "usually call in advance" when they are going to come, she said.
